*div1 type="summary"* *p*John Sibley to Austin, February 18, 1827. Political news. English designs on Cuba.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Natchitoches */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="02-18-1827">Feby, 18-1827*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dr. Sir:*/p*
*p*I have just Recd by *person_mentioned*Mr Dubois*/person_mentioned* your favour of the *date_mentioned n="02-09-1827">9th Inst: */date_mentioned*the receipt of which gave me great pleasure as *person_mentioned*Mr Dubois*/person_mentioned* Returns in an hour I have time only to Acknowledge the Receipt of your letter, to Bundle up in a hurry a few *location_mentioned*news papers*/location_mentioned* for you. *person_mentioned*Mr Dubois*/person_mentioned* tells me *person_mentioned*Mr Ranaz*/person_mentioned* will leave here in two days by him you shall hear from me again. I am now in tolerable health though for *date_mentioned n="06-xx-1826">eight months past */date_mentioned*I have been sick half the time. I am happy to hear of the Restoration of tranquility at *location_mentioned*Nacogdoches */location_mentioned*I with pleasure heard of the unanimity of the *person_mentioned*People of your *location_mentioned*colony */location_mentioned**/person_mentioned*to support Govt there never was a more silly, wild, Quicksotic scheme than that of *location_mentioned*Nacogdoches*/location_mentioned*, and all sober honest thinking *person_mentioned*people */person_mentioned*here view it in the same light—I wish it was in my Power to communicate to you the stipulations of a Treaty now before the *person_mentioned*senate of the *location_mentioned*U. S.*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned* Relative to the *location_mentioned*Boundaries */location_mentioned*between us and *location_mentioned*Mexico*/location_mentioned*, such a treaty has been signed by the *person_mentioned*Ministers of the two governments*/person_mentioned*, but what will be the future *location_mentioned*Boundary */location_mentioned*is not made public.—I wish we may Embrace your *location_mentioned*Colony*/location_mentioned*.—*/p*
*p*You will find in the *location_mentioned*Washington Paper*/location_mentioned* of the *date_mentioned n="01-15-1827">15th Ult*/date_mentioned*: some very important *location_mentioned*European */location_mentioned*News, all *location_mentioned*Europe */location_mentioned*may be embroiled in war. God protect the *location_mentioned*United States*/location_mentioned* from that calamity, if we should be drawn into it, it will be about *location_mentioned*The Island of Cuba*/location_mentioned*, we cannot suffer *location_mentioned*England */location_mentioned*to hold it, they have already shut their *location_mentioned*colonial Ports*/location_mentioned* against our vessels, they will do the same in the *location_mentioned*Ports of Cuba */location_mentioned*should they occupy it. You mention *location_mentioned*Trinity */location_mentioned*the *location_mentioned*Aishe Bayou*/location_mentioned* and perhaps *location_mentioned*Sabine*/location_mentioned*; is it not possible for you to come as far as this place when you are so near us ? I am sorry to hear of the Death of *person_mentioned*George Smyth*/person_mentioned*, an event long expected, indeed he lived longer than I thought he could when I last saw him. I have no time to Enlarge this letter as the *person_mentioned*bearer */person_mentioned*setts off so soon. You will hear from me again in *date_mentioned n="02-21-1827">two or three days*/date_mentioned* In the mean time take this opportunity to assure you of my verry great Esteem and Regard*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*John Sibley*/person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*p*Note, your expressions of Lenity towards the *person_mentioned*Prisoners */person_mentioned*are humane to the Extream, the Crime of high treason could in no Govt be passed over so lightly, I am but slightly acquainted with any of them but most with the worthless unprincipled *person_mentioned*Seymour*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*The *person_mentioned*Honble. Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*[Addressed:] *person_mentioned*Honble. Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned* at *location_mentioned*Nacogdoches*/location_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
